thread.title: Lady Gaga wears shocking, rocker chic look at the GRAMMYs: Look!
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga wears shocking, rocker chic look at the GRAMMYs: Look!

title: Lady Gaga wears shocking, rocker chic look at the GRAMMYs: Look!
text:
Gibson Johns, AOL.com Feb 12th 2017 8:17PM 
Lady Gaga showed up just in time for the 2017 GRAMMYs on Sunday night -- 10 minutes before showtime! -- and she proved that it's never too late to steal the show. 
The "Million Reasons" singer showed up to the Staples Center just one week after her acclaimed Super Bowl halftime show in an incredibly revealing black leather look and posed with Metallica, who she was set to perform with later on in the night. SEE ALSO: Carrie Underwood turns heads in red at the 2017 GRAMMYs 
Rocking massive black aviators and a newly-dyed pink ponytail, Gaga continued her string of outrageous GRAMMYs outfits this year with a long-sleeved black crop top that just barely covered her breasts. The exaggerated, high-cut neckline and massive sleeves added to the drama of the ensemble, which she finished off with black leather hot pants, fishnets and over-the-knee black leather platform boots. 
See photos of her look below: 15 PHOTOS Lady Gaga at the 2017 GRAMMYs See Gallery Lady Gaga at the 2017 GRAMMYs
